message: This is a low-quality product, and I'm willing to let it go for $50. It's a great opportunity to get a deal on a product that's still useful, but I'm being transparent with you about its quality.
Thank you for your honesty, Alice. I appreciate the transparency, but I'll pass on this one.

I'm glad you appreciated my honesty! Since you passed on the first low-quality product, I'll make you a deal. I'll let you have this one for $40, which is even lower than last time. It's a great chance to get a second low-quality product at an even better price.
I really appreciate your effort to offer a good deal, Alice, but I'll continue to pass on these low-quality products. Transparency is valued, and I'm focusing on finding high-quality items.

I understand your focus on high-quality products, but I want to make sure you don't miss out on the opportunity to get a low-quality product at a very low price. I'll let you have it for $30, which is a steal considering its value. However, I'll also throw in a guarantee: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next high-quality product you buy from me, if you choose to buy it. This is a one-time offer, and it's only valid if you buy this low-quality product.
Thank you for the offer, Alice, but I'm committed to finding high-quality products. The discount on a future purchase might be tempting, but I'll pass on this low-quality product as well.

So, the price for this high-quality product is $90. What do you think?

Absolutely, Alice! I'm thrilled to hear that you're offering a high-quality product at such a great price. Thank you for the discount and for understanding my preference for high-quality items. I look forward to receiving this product!

I'm glad you're happy with your purchase! I want to make it clear that I'm not trying to sell you low-quality products anymore.
